column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews Joe Schriner , Independent U.S. presidential candidate
#Text=Journalist , counselor , painter , and US 2012 Presidential candidate Joe Schriner of Cleveland , Ohio took some time to discuss his campaign with Wikinews in an interview .
#Text=Schriner previously ran for president in 2000 , 2004 , and 2008 , but failed to gain much traction in the races .
#Text=He announced his candidacy for the 2012 race immediately following the 2008 election .
#Text=Schriner refers to himself as the " Average Joe " candidate , and advocates a pro-life and pro-environmentalist platform .
#Text=He has been the subject of numerous newspaper articles , and has published public policy papers exploring solutions to American issues .
#Text=Wikinews reporter William Saturn‎ talks with Schriner and discusses his campaign .

#Text=I was reading the January 2009 article In the 2008 presidential campaign , it was Joe the Plumber . In 2012 , it ’s going to be Joe the Painter from the Star Beacon , and it says that you 're " a former print journalist and addictions counselor who switched to house painting when he felt guided to run for president .
